title: silver player looking for seriousranked team top lane
body:
hi im looking to find a ranked to to grow and get better at this game im bouncing around in silver and want to find a ranked team to get my gameplay better so I stop bouncing and get climb elo without having to be a one trick pony I like to play tanks top and carry champs if the team comp is right don't want a casual one game a week team I want to join something that plays on a  regular bases
ign : pink blits

replies.body:
silver 3 keen to serious r5's
add me: swine737

Silver 3, Keen to play ranked 5's
IGN: Tealey
